page.title: 12Lifestyles
page.content: In Chelmsley Wood the people live a modern life. In a survey of the area nearly every family owned a colour T.V. and 40% owned a video. The people of Chelmsley Wood seem to make full use of the areas facilities visiting pubs, clubs and restaurants in the area. Also most people, even though a high unemployment rate exists, try to take an annual holiday. Many young people were interested in sport and visited the Youth and dance clubs in the area. Gardening is high on the list of hobbies with the older generation whereas music and sport is very inherent amongst the culture of the young.Breakdancing and bodypopping have become something of a sub culture around Chelmsley Wood. Nearly everone asked still has a roast meal on Sunday but oriental food dishes are taking the place of fish and chips.
